page.title: 16LIFE 5
page.content: {Saturdays in Summer. On Saturdays I get up out of bed at about 10 o'clock and play with my Barbie doll.Usually after playing with her, I get dressed and go and get breakfast and eat it in the dining room. When I have finished I go to the drawing room to watch television. When the programmes that I want to watch have finished I go outside to play on the climbing frame. When it is lunch time I go and help mummy lay the outside table and after a cold lunch, we have an ice cream and a sweet. Then I go and settle down somewhere in a sunny place and read my best book, "The Wishing Chair." My brother and sisters keep on coming and talking to me so I lose my place in the book. I go and tell mummy and she always says keep away from them and not much else. (Cont. page 17.)
